name: Sorter (implementer76)
description:
A chill game for people who like organizing, categorizing, classifying, arranging, grouping, cataloguing or just sorting in general.

This is a demo and it includes the first 5 levels. Full game to be released soon.

How to play

Click to move boxes around the map. The goal is to have all boxes close to at least another identical box. You can organize it any way you prefer, as long as no box is left without at least one pair.

Controls

  • Click to pick up all adjacent boxes of the same type.
  • Right click to pick up one individual box.
  • R to rotate held boxes.
  • WASD to move around.
  • Mouse wheel to zoom.

Credits

  • Blox font
  • Gravity font
  • Pica hole font
  • Sprites from JoyPixels
